TaxonIdentification.variety_authority: H. St. John & F. A. Warren

TaxonIdentification.subspecies_authority: (H. St. John & F. A. Warren) S. Stokes

treatment.description: Plants 2–4 dm. Aerial flowering stems slender, not fistulose, 1–3 dm, usually glabrous rarely floccose. Leaf blades lanceolate, 2–7 × (0.7–)1–2(–2.5) cm. Involucres glabrous. Flowers 5–6 mm; perianth bright yellow or ochroleucous.
treatment.discussion: Variety lancifolium is local and usually uncommon in the mountains of Chelan, Kittitas, Okanogan, and Yakima counties in eastern Washington.
